who-is-lord.english: Who is the LORD that I should heed Him?

will-not-let-go.english: I will not let Israel go

hardened-heart.english: The LORD hardened the heart of Pharaoh

more-bricks.context: Pharaoh increases the burden on Israelites
more-bricks.english: Let heavier work be laid on the men

this-time-sinned.context: Pharaoh admits sin during plague of hail

go-serve.context: Pharaoh finally releases Israel after death of firstborn
go-serve.english: Rise up, go out from among my people!

chase-them-down.context: Pharaoh changes his mind and pursues
chase-them-down.hebrew: מַה זֹּאת עָשִׂינוּ כִּי שִׁלַּחְנוּ אֶת יִשְׂרָאֵל
chase-them-down.english: What have we done, letting Israel go?

trapped-at-sea.context: Pharaoh's army realizes God fights for Israel
trapped-at-sea.hebrew: אָנוּסָה מִפְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל כִּי יְהוָה נִלְחָם לָהֶם
trapped-at-sea.english: Let us flee from Israel, for the LORD fights for them
